TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityTrackingRecord extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains the data sent to a tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when an is matched. It is also used in the return list of the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service. The tracking service can perform whatever action is needed on the data in the tracking record.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Body As IList(Of TrackingDataItem)

Docs.summary: Gets a list that contains any data extracted from the workflow for the that was matched.
Docs.value: A list of objects each of which contains a single piece of extracted data and its associated annotations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance. The data to be extracted is specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can contain two kinds of objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the activity associated with the activity status event; and, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow. Both of these extract types can also specify annotations to be returned with the extracted data. The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates each piece of extracted data and its associated annotations in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>, and adds this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>.
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> has no meaning for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> and is always a null reference (`Nothing`).
This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format:

<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventDateTime%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the activity status event that matched the .
Docs.value: A value that indicates the order of the activity status event in the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indicates the relative order of the event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> within the workflow instance. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Workflow::ComponentModel::ActivityExecutionStatus ExecutionStatus { System::Workflow::ComponentModel::ActivityExecutionStatus get(); void set(System::Workflow::ComponentModel::ActivityExecutionStatus value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the execution status of the activity associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A workflow instance only emits activity status events when the execution status of an activity instance changes. Therefore an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can only be matched when an activity execution status change occurs. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> that triggered the match and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to be sent. It reflects the current status of the activity instance. <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
